channel.title: [317] Mac Client Errors
channel.description:
Source: Delta
Hey guys, I'm just have a slight problem with my webclient/downloadable client. It isn't working for macs, it downloads the cache and everything correctly, but it gets stuck at "Unpacking files". Basically, it can't find the directory. What would you use for macs? If anyone knows how to fix this, and can supply their code it would be much appreciated. Even if you think you know how, any suggestions are appreciated.
Thanks a lot. :)

item.title: [317] Mac Client Errors
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

no need for a double post when both of your topics where less than 1 post apart… they’re not now, because I just posted which brought it to the top…

Read full topic
